splash_welcome: Welcome to Cycle for Lisbon! Get to know the city in the 2 wheels and help the community.
onboard_welcome_desc: Get ready to explore the city of Lisbon on two wheels while making a positive impact on NGO initiatives.
onboard_initiative_desc: Choose the initiative you want to support and learn more about its goal and promoters.
onboard_coin_desc: For every kilometer you ride, you will earn coins that can be converted into real money to support the initiative you selected. Cycle for Lisbon is made possible by the generous support of sponsors.
onboard_help_desc: The coins you earn will automatically be donated to your selected initiative. You can only have one active initiative at a time. When the initiative's goal is reached, you will be prompted to select a new one.
onboard_project_desc: Cycle for Lisbon is developed by Pensar Mais for Vox Pop, a project co-financed by Câmara Municipal de Lisboa and the European Regional Development Fund through the European Urban Initiative.
enter_email_recover: Enter the email address you used to register
sure_delete_account: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
delete_acount_desc: By doing so, all your data will be permanently deleted and cannot be recovered. This action cannot be undone.
login_to_account: Login to your Cycle for Lisbon account
no_account_sign_up: Don't have an account? Sign up
enter_email_sign_up: Enter your e-mail address to sign up
complete_profile_heading: Complete your profile by adding additional info about yourself
thank_for_support: Thank you for your support! This goal was completed. Want to select a new one?
want_select_new: Want to select a new one?
initiative_placeholder: This is a description placeholder. Here you can describe your initiative and how it will impact your community,
institution_placeholder: This is a description placeholder. Here you can give information about your Institution and its area of work.
unlcoked_badge_title: You have Unlocked X Badges out of 12
about_desc: Cycle for Lisbon aims to be a platform where NGOs and Institutions can share their social projects (known as Initiatives) and get a direct support from the community (the Users). Each Initiative has the support of sponsors, that will convert the in-app coins into real money and donate it to the institutions responsible for the respective initiatives sponsored by them.
